chapters.title: Chapter 18: To Feel Wasted
chapters.info: Rosil, p. 346—Slender, lanky, long-necked Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah. She is the new Mistress of Novices in the reunified White Tower. She was put in charge of the hospital in Mayene during the battle. She has helped women who have lost Warders before. See also Mistress of Novices.
